{{codepointer|Classic attack}} '''A_BetaSkullAttack'''
(no parameters)
The attack of press-release beta Doom's {{Class|BetaSkull|version of the lost soul}}. It is an invisible, instant attack that directly inflicts damage to the target, unless the target belongs to the same [[species]] as the calling actor. Since the damage is inflicted in this manner, rather than through a [[projectile]] or a [[hitscan]], the function can never trigger [[infighting]].
When damage is to be inflicted, the calling actor plays its {{Property|AttackSound|attack sound}}, which is played on the ''weapon'' [[Sound channels|channel]] ({{c|{{const|CHAN_WEAPON}}}}), [[A_FaceTarget|faces its target]], and does the damage. The damage inflicted is 1d8 times the calling actor's {{c|{{Property|Damage}}}} property, and is of [[Damage types|damage type]] {{c|None}}.
